body: One man was killed and three were injured yesterday in shootings at bars in Brooklyn and Queens, the police said. The police have not identified any suspects in the three incidents. The dead man, whose name was not released, was shot once in the chest after he and other men began arguing at the Poke Knockers bar in Prospect Heights at 4 a.m., said
title: 1 Killed and 3 Hurt In Gunfire at 3 Bars

body: It will be tough to crash a private New Year's soiree around Prospect Park this year. title: NEIGHBORHOOD REPORT: NEW YORK 2000; Going to a New Year's Eve Party? Got Any Proof?

title: Six Months After Slaying, An Investigation Is Stymied

title: METRO NEWS BRIEFS: NEW YORK; 8 Are Hurt as Van Jumps Curb in Brooklyn

title: If You're Thinking of Living In / Prospect Heights, Brooklyn; A Diverse Neighborhood Spruces Up in a Turnaround

body: LIEUT. ERIC ADAMS'S police career began with a beating. His own. title: Killer of Student Took Pains to Conceal Clues, Police Say
